properties.name: blog.draft.delete-after-publish
properties.description: 发表文章后是否删除草稿.

properties.name: kaciras.oauth2.www-host
properties.description: 前端页面的host，用于验证登陆跳转.

properties.name: kaciras.http-client-proxy
properties.description: 本地HTTP客户端（用于OAuth2等）使用的代理地址.

properties.name: kaciras.rate-limit.generic.rate
properties.description: 允许的速率（令牌/秒），必须大于0.

properties.name: kaciras.rate-limit.generic.size
properties.description: 令牌桶容量，同时也是单位时间能获取的上限（令牌），必须大于0.

properties.name: kaciras.rate-limit.effective.block-times
properties.description: 针对副作用请求，在限流的基础上进一步增加封禁措施，封禁时间根据该列表依次递增.

properties.name: kaciras.rate-limit.effective.refresh-on-reject
properties.description: 针对副作用请求，在封禁期内再次访问则重新倒计时封禁时间.

properties.name: kaciras.rate-limit.effective.buckets
properties.description: 针对副作用请求的多级限流的令牌桶列表.
